sailpoint.object

Class DynamicScope.PopulationRequestAuthority

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.tools.xml.AbstractXmlObject
      • sailpoint.object.DynamicScope.PopulationRequestAuthority
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sailpoint.tools.xml.PersistentXmlObject
    Enclosing class:
    DynamicScope

    public static class DynamicScope.PopulationRequestAuthority
extends AbstractXmlObject
    PopulationRequestAuthority is used to define the list of identities a user can 'request for'. In the previous releases to version 6.4 this was defined in various configuration options but is now consolidated to this object.

    Setting Configuration.LCM_REQUEST_CONTROLS_ALLOW_ALL to true in the map will ignore any other properties (Configuration.LCM_REQUEST_CONTROLS_DISABLE_SCOPING excluded)

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
